bibl.title: Neilos in Alexandrian Art. A Study of a Recently Discovered Statue of the God Neilos in Alexandria.
Praktika tou XII diethnous synedriou klasikes archaiologias. Athena, 4-10 Septembriou 1983

bibl.seg: El-Kalza Susan, Neilos in Alexandrian Art. A Study of a Recently Discovered Statue of the God Neilos in Alexandria.
Praktika tou XII diethnous synedriou klasikes archaiologias. Athena, 4-10 Septembriou 1983 (Athena, 1988) pp. 243-249 et pl. 46.
